questList.questDescription: Beware! The Shaded Grove is enchanted with illusions crafted to befuddle even the wisest travelers. Seek out Grimalker, the Dark Imp who shrouds himself within the shadows, confounding your path with evermore deceptions.

The Grove hides a unique opportunity for alliance. Mandate unity with Elonthisia, the Liquid Crown, who commands the elemental forces of water with grace. Unite with such an ally to channel her aqueous wisdom.
Intruding upon the tranquility of the grove is the shadowy menace wielded by the Hairy Devil, Gurrik the Tempestral. Root out and defeat him to draw light back into the creeping darkness.

questLevels.levelName: Arid Crossroads of the Verdant Wing

questList.questDescription: Stepping forth upon the unforgiving sands, face the might of Elarion, the Verdant Wing. Choose whether to oppose or align with the drake that guards the path known and unknown across the arid expanse.

Within the golden desert lies unity forgotten by time. Seek the formidable Azelron the Inferno Talon and Nasriam the Boiler. Combining forces with these guardians, balancing fire against challenging steam, will prove to wield immense power.

Raging through the sands burns the preternatural force of the Balrug Firebringer. His destructive path must be halted to stabilize the crossroads and ensure safe passage through this elementally untamed territory.

At the very heart of the Whispering Wilderness lies darkness most fathomless. Capture or exterminate Vharishan, the Serpent Sovereign whose serpentine hold prefudes nightmares beyond imagination stark and unnamed seize strike unseen labyrinth unstoppable.
